sourcesContent:
import {useSignIn} from "react-auth-kit"; import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; function Login(props: any) { const signIn = useSignIn(); const submit = async (values: any) => { values.preventDefault() console.log(values) const [token, setToken] = useState([{}]); useEffect(() => { fetch('/api/user/login', { method: 'POST', body: values, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' } }).then(res => res.json()) .then(res => setToken(res)) }) console.log(token) } return <>

Login



} export default Login;
